lead_paragraph: Admit it: You've always wanted Carmen Electra to wish you a happy birthday. Or maybe not. But she is going to be at the ready just in case.
snippet: A start-up called Cameo Stars will try to hop aboard the social media gravy train by selling video greetings from celebrities and athletes on Facebook.

headline.main: Just Click for Messages From the Stars

abstract: A start-up called Cameo Stars will try to hop aboard the social media gravy train by selling video greetings from celebrities and athletes on Facebook.
